titleStmt.title: A shorte treatyse of the mysterie of the Euchariste: set furth, by Lewys Euans
titleStmt.author: Evans, Lewis, fl. 1574.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Pawles Churchyarde, at the signe of the Lucrece: by Thomas Purfoote],

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and printer's name and address from colophon.
Running title reads: A treatyse of the Eucharyste.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
